People spend a huge amount of time on small screens (smartphones and tablets in portrait mode), therefore it is now imperative that all websites are mobile-friendly. This site works well on most devices.

If you are using a desktop browser, vary the width of the window to see how the content flows and the header continues to display well.

Responsive Web Design

This site implements the following concepts:

  • This is a mobile-first layout.
  • There is one major break point in the design at 600px. When the screen is narrower than that the gray background disappears and the font sizes get a little smaller.
  • The footer always sits at the bottom of the screen regardless of how much content is on the page (FooterStick-concept).
